addGold() - Method in class Player

B

board - Variable in class Player
The board on which the player is located
Board - Class in Unnamed Package
Class to represent the game board The board is a 2D array of tiles onto which the player and bot are placed The board is populated from a map file which is read in using the GameFile class

D

decideAction() - Method in class BotPlayer
Determines the logic for the action that the bot will take Works using the concept of a target If the bot has no target, it will look to try to find one
distanceFrom(Location) - Method in class Location
Deprecated.
as BotPlayer now calculates distance based on the length of the BFS path

F

findPath(Location) - Method in class BotPlayer
Method to find a path to the target, if there is one on the bot's knownBoard - simple version of breadth first search Create a two dimensional array of strings.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
Main method to run the game Sets up the game, the board and the players, including placing them on the board First turn handled separately to allow LOOTER to implicitly say HELLO on first turn After that the game loops so long as it isn't lost (winning handled elsewhere)
move(char) - Method in class Location
Converts compass direction movements to changes in x and y coordinates in the location space
movePlayer(char) - Method in class Player
Move the player one square north on the board Checks that the player is not at the top edge of the board If not, moves the player one square north If the move lands the player on wall, moves the player back to their original location
moveToTarget() - Method in class BotPlayer
Moves the bot to the target location via the path found by the findPath method.

P

pickUp() - Method in class Player

Player - Class in Unnamed Package
